wikipedia_page.main: Greig Hutcheon (born 20 March 1973) is a Scottish professional golfer. He had three victories on the Challenge Tour between 1999 and 2003. He has won both the Scottish PGA Championship and the Northern Open twice. Hutcheon has won the "Tartan Tour" Order of Merit seven times.
